text.div:
Average Number of Cigarettes Smoked Per Day

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    63629-0 On the number of days you reported you smoked cigarettes during the past 30 days, how many cigarettes did you smoke per day, on average [PhenX]
    64218-1 How many cigarettes do you smoke per day now [PhenX]
    64219-9 On the average of the entire time you smoked, how many cigarettes did you smoke per day [PhenX]

name: Average Number of Cigarettes Smoked Per Day
